casebody.data:
PAYNE
v.
CHARLOTTE HEATING & AIR et al. No. 526A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2006. M. Reid Acree, Jr., K. Edward Greene, Kathleen A. Naggs, Raleigh, Mona Lisa Wallace, Richard Huffman, Salisbury, for Payne. Sean M. Phelan, Charlotte, for Charlotte Heating & Air.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of October 2005 by Defendants (Ross and Witner, Inc. and Travelers Ins. Co.) to Amend Notice of Appeal:

*489"Motion Dismissed as Moot by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2006."
